item.title: Beomaster 8000: Ready for Some Bench Testing
item.description: After powering up the Beomaster and confirming its audio quality with an iPod and FM radio, I began the reassembly process. However, the remote control wasn’t working. Troubleshooting this will require investigating the power supply board, which houses the remote control receiver. For now, I’ve decided to proceed with bench testing. My initial test involved connecting the Beomaster to a previously restored Beocord 9000 using a DIN cable. The Beocord’s play button activated the Beomaster’s TP1 play mode, and the Beomaster’s standby button turned off both devices, confirming proper communication.
